## goup-util generate all

Generate all artifacts (docs, etc.)

### Synopsis

Generate all project artifacts.

This runs all generation tasks:
- CLI documentation (markdown)

Examples:
  goup-util generate all
  goup-util generate all --output-dir ./custom-docs

```
goup-util generate all [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                help for all
      --output-dir string   Output directory for generated docs (default "docs/cli")
```
